content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. Please, feel free to ask any questions you have about the apartment. Regarding the rental price, I'm sure we can find a fair agreement that suits both our needs. How much were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that's both affordable and comfortable. I've seen similar apartments in the area for around €700 per month. Would that be a fair starting point for this discussion?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €700 per month is a reasonable starting point. However, considering the location and the amenities the apartment offers, I was thinking more along the lines of €800. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, €800 is a bit higher than I had anticipated. Given that the apartment is on the smaller side at 25 square meters, I believe €750 would be more in line with the market value for this area. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at €775?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I understand your perspective. While €750 may be closer to what you were expecting, I must insist on €800 due to the unique features and the prime location of the apartment. However, I'm willing to negotiate. How about this: if you can convince me that €775 is the best I can get for this apartment, I'll agree to that price. How would you sell the €775 to me?
name: Heinrich Heine
